entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: WSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
